TopicTitle: The Asteroid Sentinels: A KSP Graphic Novel (Series 8 Episode 10: Finale!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, SaturnianBlue said:
> 
> 
> @Kuzzter! What happened here! We've got wormholes, Large Black Monoliths, and a Jeb talking about strange stories and stuff... As well as being a part of "A Jool Odyssey"?!
> 

Phew--good thing Kenlie sent him back in time, who knows what would have happened? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> 19 minutes ago, Kuzzter said:
> 
> 
> Phew--good thing Kenlie sent him back in time, who knows what would have happened? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

The kerbals will be attempting to access these wormholes, I'm certain they will... Who knows where they might end up if they do...

Series 6 Episode 6 Is here, and the kerbals celebrate a victory, but that will be short-lived...![zQV5BfG.png](http://i.imgur.com/zQV5BfG.png)![pZetc21.png](http://i.imgur.com/pZetc21.png)![02NO4dv.png](http://i.imgur.com/02NO4dv.png)![C26j24q.png](http://i.imgur.com/C26j24q.png)![JCj0Xly.png](http://i.imgur.com/JCj0Xly.png)Thanks for reading, leave any feedback you might have below!

Edit: This is my 404th Post ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") That does not mean "404 Asteroid Not Found" however....

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-28T01:24:57Z" title="01/28/2016 01:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">January 28, 2016</time> by SaturnianBlue**

We reached 14,000 views on this thread! Woohoo! On to 15K!

Here's Episode 7, the episode of some asteroid science, and some peculiar things occurring with the refinery, and ADM...

![hKggpV4.png](http://i.imgur.com/hKggpV4.png)

![wbHrg1o.png](http://i.imgur.com/wbHrg1o.png)![jIxk3n7.png](http://i.imgur.com/jIxk3n7.png)![ZZuAwOX.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZZuAwOX.png)So what did happen to the Refinery? I think it's possible to find what happened just from the screenshots...

Episode 8 Brings back the refinery... However, some more bizarre activity has been going on...![1LM9oUK.png](http://i.imgur.com/1LM9oUK.png)![GZF0AQ3.png](http://i.imgur.com/GZF0AQ3.png)![jvJqLkC.png](http://i.imgur.com/jvJqLkC.png)![A6moMdD.png](http://i.imgur.com/A6moMdD.png)![ITZhB3u.png](http://i.imgur.com/ITZhB3u.png)

Please leave some feedback for this episode: Things you like and things I could improve. Thank you.

EDIT: This thread has made it onto the 1st page for posts and 2nd for views!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-04T11:41:07Z" title="02/04/2016 11:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">February 4, 2016</time> by SaturnianBlue**

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/l7iZp/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

Apologies for not posting episodes recently, but i've been testing out some asteroids for future use on this comic, and soon I will be able to release the next episode on The Asteroid Sentinels.
Good shooting.  I find it hard to ram anything intentionally ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Finally, the asteroid has been made, and now I can release the  ninth episode in Series 6 of The Asteroid Sentinels!![Ps6dUmy.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ps6dUmy.png)![rqTiH9y.png](http://i.imgur.com/rqTiH9y.png)![3I58J53.png](http://i.imgur.com/3I58J53.png)![CFZEUiA.png](http://i.imgur.com/CFZEUiA.png)![7mNIO8A.png](http://i.imgur.com/7mNIO8A.png)DUN DUN DUN!!!!! Great things will happen soon, but they don't seem to be all that good for the Kerbals...

So... you actually *made* this uber-asteroid? And plotted it on a course for Kerbal extinction? Well now. That's what I call 'raising the stakes'. You have my attention ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, Kuzzter said:
> 
> 
> So... you actually *made* this uber-asteroid? And plotted it on a course for Kerbal extinction? Well now. That's what I call 'raising the stakes'. You have my attention ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

I certainly made it, and while I'm not sure the kerbals will go out like Kerbasaurs (it isn't 10Km in size for Ex.) but there will definitely be much Murder, Terror, And Death!

Well, good luck dealing with that big rock.....

I hope somebody puts a network of camera satellites all around Kerbin to get footage of the impact from various angles ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, Geschosskopf said:
> 
> 
> Well, good luck dealing with that big rock.....
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I hope somebody puts a network of camera satellites all around Kerbin to get footage of the impact from various angles ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

Well first, the kerbals will try to intercept it and blow it up! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

Here we are with the tenth episode of Series 6! The first page kinda goes over what has already been covered as well as the 2nd one, they are more or less a "recap" for the general public.

![Kfv6lj0.png](http://i.imgur.com/Kfv6lj0.png)![cB5vkun.png](http://i.imgur.com/cB5vkun.png)![l1gAloj.png](http://i.imgur.com/l1gAloj.png)![VUOieV1.png](http://i.imgur.com/VUOieV1.png)![9OBH654.png](http://i.imgur.com/9OBH654.png)![NpvlvFZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/NpvlvFZ.png)...

Oh boy, riots and wanton destruction.  Yay! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 8 minutes ago, Geschosskopf said:
> 
> 
> Oh boy, riots and wanton destruction.  Yay! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

Not so yay for the KSC. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") Kerbals can be rather violent when there lives get shaken up.
\*gasp\* Not the administrative building!

Quickly hurling towards the end on Series 6, this episode focuses on the debate of where and how to abort the mission, so they can safely return in time for the launch. First however, an article by KuzzStu M. Kerman...![pIbimIQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/pIbimIQ.png)![heOTYeN.png](http://i.imgur.com/heOTYeN.png)![eGXaZh4.png](http://i.imgur.com/eGXaZh4.png)The spaceplane does indeed have SSTO capability, but capacity for SSTO is fairly limited, requiring refueling to go past LKO.

Working on the finale, the scripts are done, the crafts are done, now I need to start filming, and i'll need to figure out how kerbal spacesuit textures work, then i'll be ready (I need one for Gus, Mort, Wernher, and Linus)/Draw them! Here's one of the ships to be considered, and a room...![IdvjO19.png](http://i.imgur.com/IdvjO19.png)![ql86XNf.png](http://i.imgur.com/ql86XNf.png)

Almost done with the finale episode, here's a teaser picture.![YgdfCan.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YgdfCan.jpg)

The long awaited finale of Series 6 is here, and the clock is ticking as an asteroid 300 meters across roars towards Kerbin...

![5juRHpG.png](http://i.imgur.com/5juRHpG.png)![AJVtWpB.png](http://i.imgur.com/AJVtWpB.png)![K2i5wkB.png](http://i.imgur.com/K2i5wkB.png)![ss6JF54.png](http://i.imgur.com/ss6JF54.png)

Spoiler

![tSRQGLc.png](http://i.imgur.com/tSRQGLc.png)

Yes... That happened...    

Can anyone guess what the meeting room is inspired by? 

For Series 7, I might try and carry this save to a career one, because I have plans for a sequel....
Sounds like a job for Bruce Kerman and a team of oil rig workers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

>

> 
> 
> Sounds like a job for Bruce Kerman and a team of oil rig workers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Surely training astronauts to be miners is easier? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") We hope one of his crew doesn't catch [Space Dementia!](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SpaceMadness)

Of course, my asteroid is (thankfully) not the size Texkas, that would be like throwing minmus at kerbin. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
Testing out some crafts for the next episode, here's a little 5 seat ferry.![24c8pyb.png](http://i64.tinypic.com/24c8pyb.png)
